OOC: Could you post Blacknightmare's pod arriving or I should post 
iit. BTW, what's happened with Zero?

Windlord:

Windlord avoided the slash flying up; while he did that he took one 
of his sharped feathers  and flew towards Vampiza.

"You fight good, bat-bot" said Windlord


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Its a shield. Heh much like the portable shields Yan told me a 
> few chars have. Somewhat like hellpeons but not as potent and 
strong.
> 
> Vampiza twirled to the right to avoid the blasts before he swooped 
> down at windlord as he attempted to impale him with a sword of 
> Chaochitan energy.
>

> > OOC: If I remember rightly it's against rules intercept fire
